owunta kalyana mithuran haduna ganna bari wenawa ..janathawage prasadaya owun wisinma nathi kara gannawa.manawa dayawa nathi aya janatha sewayata sudusu wanne na .ada rata karawana boho denek boru karayan ,wachalayan wela .ee nisa ratata aalokayak watenne na .mahinda rajapaksha mahathata rate palana balaya meheyawimata labunoth nawa prabodhayakin rata yali nagitimata patan gannawa .eeta pasu jathika mathiwarana walata yanna puluwan .

‘janadhipathithuma nisa prathama waratauuwa palath wasiyan sanwardhanaya bhukthi windimin sitinawa’ - jyeshta amathya diw gunasekara senasurada, 16 agosthu 2014, 17:36 (kolambaa, lankapuwath) – janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma uuwa palatha sanwardhanaya kirima haraha prathama waratauuwa palath wasiyan sanwardhanaya bhukthi windimin sitina bawa jyeshta amathya diw gunasekara mahatha pawasayi.

mema bahukaryaya sanwardhana wyapruthiye aramunu atharin pawul miliyana 1.5k sandaha krushikarmika katayuthu karagena yamata sahaya wima, uthuru wiyali kalapaya kramayen gila ganimin pawathina ugra jala hingayata menma wakugadu rogayatada muhunapa sitina rajarata pradeshaye 300,000kata wadi pawul sankhyawak sandaha pirisudu paniya jala pahasukam sapayima pradhana we.

aththatama ape maharajage piya di ee kiyana raja paksha thumada???mama bohoma janapriya madamulana beliaththa kiyana pathiwala janapriya katakathawak oyalata kiyannam....oya di ee mahaththan godak kolambaa hema enna una kenek lu..ithin ee nisa samanyayen gedara innawa aduyilu,,,oya athare oya di ee unnansege deshapalana katayuthu balagena thiyenne ee kiwwe gam mattame sanwidana katayuthu hema hinni mahaththaya kiyala beliaththe porak...me hinni mahaththayata issara beliaththa paththe godak janapriya namak thibila thiyanawa...oya hinni mahaththaya saha lamathani athara amuthu sambandayak thibila thiyanawa....oya kathawe kiyana widihata di ee ge niyama puthawenne ape kathawata nayaka thuma witharayi..anik 3 denatama thiyenne ammage penuma saha ara hinni mahaththayage penuma kiyalayi parana aya kiyanne...ee pilibanda hoyaganna mata oya hinni mahaththaya kiyana kenage pinthurayak hoyaganna nam bari una....eeth tikak piliganna puluwan lakshana kipayak thiyanawa...*maharajage puthala 3 n denagen 1 kenekwath di ee thuma wage na...*anik gota ba sil lamayithuth mama hithanne di ee thumage fes kat nathi aya...*walawwaka sulu sewakayingen pawathena di ee thumata thibune eheyi parsanalti ekak..ma hindaya wage sarama ussala chandi pat damana lakshana ethumata thibila na...(ma hinda sajita issarama kale banne parasutkara ............k awith apita kiyala )*pradhana sanwidayakayek widihata hinni mahaththayage thibuna godak thiyari poyint ma hinda langa thiyanawa kiyalayi samaharu kiyanne....*di ee oya cha mal thuma wage keneklu ee tharam ad karayek nemeyi lu*hinni mahaththaya kiyana kena wenath kulayaka keneklu ithin mahinda chanda thiyanakota hambanthota mathara ehema dinanne udinma oya mahindage malti chanal kula ke s eka nisa kiyala samaharu kiyanawa...(mangala ayithi kulaya ohu dinanna prabalama sadhakayak wenawa matharadi athithaye unath mathara oya kule aya 2n nekwatha matharin gihin thiyanawa parlimenthuwata )kiyana widihata onna oya awamangalayage kule manussayeklu hinni mahaththaya....

aayathanaya pudgalika ayathanata pawarimata pera obata durakathanayak uwamana nam wasara 10pamana balasitimata siduuna (1987 apita awurudu 8 ho 9 sitimata siduuna ) ema kalayadi rupiyak 15000 gewimata siduwu bawayi mage mathakaya eya ada mudalin rupiyak 300000 pamana, ada dina 7th athulatha rupiyal 7000 pamana mudalakata labagatha hakiyi (owunge prawardana pahasukamak magin ape dewani durakathanayata giye rupiyal 3000 pamanayi )meyin pahara wadinne ape apanayana weladamatayi, lokaya samaga tharaga kirimata nam apanayana waladi, rajya aayathana walin siduwana kalaya kadamima nawathiya yuthuyi, wideshiya aayojakayan balanne lankawe nishpadanaya karanawanam adala nimi nishpadithaya labaganimata gathawana mulu piriwaya saha kalayayi yana kalaya wadinam owun mehi aayojana walata noenu athi.
